# Clean Cut Painting & Handyman

> Professional painting and handyman services serving Decatur, Springfield, and Central Illinois since 2012.

## Company Overview

Clean Cut Painting & Handyman is a family-owned business providing residential and commercial painting, deck staining, power washing, cabinet refinishing, and handyman services. We are known for exceptional craftsmanship, transparent pricing, and a commitment to customer satisfaction.

## Contact Information

- **Business Name**: Clean Cut Painting & Handyman
- **Phone**: (217) 899-6857
- **Email**: info@cleancutservice.com
- **Address**: 1004 E Eldorado St, Decatur, IL 62521
- **Website**: https://cleancutservice.com
- **Hours**: Monday-Friday 7:00 AM - 5:00 PM

## Service Areas

Primary: Decatur, Springfield, Champaign-Urbana, Bloomington-Normal, Illinois
Counties Served: Macon, Sangamon, Champaign, McLean, DeWitt, Piatt, Christian, Logan, Menard

## Services Offered

### Residential Services
- Interior Painting (walls, ceilings, trim, doors, accent walls)
- Exterior Painting (siding, trim, gutters, soffits, fascia, garage doors)
- Deck Staining and Restoration
- Power Washing (driveways, patios, decks, siding)
- Cabinet Refinishing
- Handyman Services (repairs, installations, maintenance)

### Commercial Services
- Office and retail space painting
- Industrial facility painting
- Multi-unit property maintenance
- Commercial power washing

## Unique Value Proposition

1. **Family-Owned**: Personal attention and accountability on every project
2. **Comprehensive Preparation**: Proper surface prep before any coating application
3. **Quality Materials**: Premium paints and stains for long-lasting results
4. **Transparent Pricing**: Detailed written estimates with no hidden fees
5. **Satisfaction Guarantee**: Not finished until you're 100% satisfied

## Credentials

- Google Rating: 5.0 stars (89+ reviews)
- Licensed and Insured
- Serving Central Illinois since 2012

## Leadership Team

- Dara Geiser - Owner & President
- Colby Geiser - Operations Manager
- Jack Geiser - Operations Manager
